Born Cha Leung Yung on Feb 6th, 1924, Hangzhou, he is a native of Haining, Zhejiang Province. Jin Yong's fantasy novels have been adapted onto television over and over again. He is one of the most important writers in modern Chinese literature. Being also a famous Hong Kong journalist and political/social activist, he has spent more than 30 years working as a professional in the press field. Jin Yong is considered to be the most famous writer of martial arts novels. He has written 15 popular martial arts (wuxia) novels, 20 thousand thesis, editorials, articles, and novel studies. His works have been translated into English, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese and Indonesian. *sighs* If only I can read his books in it's original text.
